name: BlockBoard
description:
GOAL: Defeat your opponent by either making them have no blocks to move to, or moving into them. 

It's a two player turn based game, so the controls for both people are the same.

WASD to move.

Install in the itch app if you don't want to look at the nasty un-compiled files you'd need to extract and play.

Links and stuff:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCRnQKl2zltkV7Ed7qZMDIg

https://discord.gg/BMFqWW8
